episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_01: As I rather expected, I didn’t stand a chance.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_02:
Had I managed to defeat you, the elegant
and esteemed of Psychic types...
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_03:
I would’ve demonstrated the fruits of my
training...and proven my strength as a
full-fledged Gym Leader.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_04: No! Psychic Inner Focus! I shall not give up!
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_05: Until the day I defeat you...
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_09: Why are you so determined to outdo me?
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_11:
Because you are a Psychic-type user—
and from a respected family yourself.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_12:
As a matter of fact, I come from a
long-standing family of psychics.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_14:
But I can only move things with my mind,
and my Gym is still in the minor division,
so my family labeled me a disappointment.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_15:
So you thought by defeating me, you could
prove yourself to your family?
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_17:
But I doubt someone as refined and elegant
as you could truly grasp how it feels to be a
letdown like me!
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_20:
I used to struggle to control my strong
psychic powers, so I wasn’t allowed to take
part in battles that might stir my emotions.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_21:
In the past, I was immature and marked
by failure.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_22:
Oh, I see... I’m ever so sorry for making
assumptions.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_24:
Having no psychic powers at all is better
than having psychic powers you can’t
control.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_25:
That’s what I used to think, at least, but
someone I know would say to me...
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_26:
“Having everything go your way is the road
to disillusionment.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_27:
“It’s important to know the difference
between what’s impossible and what’s
possible.”
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_29:
Winning is important, but what’s more
important is whether you’ve done better this
time than last.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_31:
Anyway, that’s all I wanted to say. Sorry for
taking your time.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_33:
I hope that one day, I might possess a spirit
as elegant as yours.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4001_1001_34: Well, here I go once again! Avery, Teleport!
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4002_1001_04:
The girl who knows the hearts of dragons,
right?
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4002_1001_06: Well yeah, you’ve quite the nickname.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4002_1001_07:
I’m guessing you know everything there is to
know about dragon Pokémon, huh.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4002_1001_08:
Yup! I’ve been around dragon Pokémon
since I was little, so I know tons about them!
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4002_1001_09:
Haha, great... This one’s definitely harder to
handle than the Hoenn Champion...
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4002_1001_10:
Oh well, whatever. If we’re doing this,
let’s get on with it.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4002_1001_11:
You’re here to battle me, right? To see
who’s better?
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4002_1001_13: I actually came to chat with you!
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4002_1001_15:
Yup! I want you to tell me about the
Draconid people!
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4002_1001_16: Oh. Guess I need more imagination.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4002_1001_17:
I heard from Steven that the Draconids and
Rayquaza have been protecting this planet
since long ago, right?
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4002_1001_18:
I wanna hear about how people and
Pokémon have been friends for so long!
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4002_1001_20:
It’s not really the happy story you’re
imagining. Still wanna hear it?
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4002_1001_23:
Teaming up with Rayquaza to protect this
planet...
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4002_1001_24:
You’re exactly how I imagined you’d be,
from the stories about the Draconids!
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4002_1001_26:
I don’t know if you can truly understand the
hearts of dragons, but...
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4002_1001_28: Since you flattered me so much...
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4002_1001_29:
Let me tell you the history of the
Draconid people.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_01:
That was impressive—exactly what I’d
expect from the Tower Tycoon.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_02:
I can see my battling skills still have a long
way to go.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_05:
You’ve got the strength to rival even a
Tower Tycoon like me!
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_07: What kind of place is the Battle Tower?
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_09:
The Battle Tower is a facility in the Battle
Frontier where you can participate in
Pokémon battles.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_10:
Skilled Trainers gather to push themselves
through tough battles and win, to aim for
new heights.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_11:
I’m usually based in Sinnoh, but I’ve heard
other regions have Battle Towers too.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_14: Actually...I don’t remember much of my past.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_15:
All I remember is being in Hoenn...guarding
some kind of tower. That’s it.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_17:
After hearing what you said about Battle
Towers, I was thinking...
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_18:
maybe the tower I remember was one
of those.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_20:
Well, I can say this: I’ve never seen you
in Sinnoh.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_21:
But I’ve heard there’s a Battle Tower in
Hoenn as well.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_22:
Judging by your skills and the way you
battle, it’s likely you were once a Tower
Tycoon or something.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_24:
It’s hard to believe I’m anywhere near
your level.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_25: If you’re not sure, how about this...
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_26:
Why not aim to become a Pasio Tower
Tycoon?
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_28:
The Pasio Towers have no official Tower
Tycoon right now.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_29: Why not make that title your goal?
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_30:
And who knows—if you do claim it, maybe
it’ll help you get your memories back.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_31:
You’re right. Dwelling on the past won’t help
me move forward!
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4003_1001_33:
I’ll be your rival as Sinnoh’s Tower Tycoon,
and we’ll see who comes out on top!
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4004_1001_01: Thanks, that was a great training session.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4004_1001_02:
No, thank YOU! It was great for me too—
and for my Pokémon.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4004_1001_03:
Oh, hey, Mother. Yeah, I’m fine. I’ll be back
soon.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4004_1001_05:
Yeah, I guess she seems that way on the
outside.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4004_1001_06:
Sometimes she’s too protective—and other
times, not at all. She can be kinda extreme.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4004_1001_07:
Seems we’ve both got issues with our mums,
doesn’t it.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4004_1001_09:
Yeah. Ever since we had a disagreement,
we’ve had a bit of a falling out.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4004_1001_10:
She’d been strict with me for years, wanting
me to take over her Ice-type Gym, so I
rebelled.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4004_1001_11:
I chose a different path, and it led to a
huge fight.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4004_1001_13:
Hehe, seems kids not wanting to live up to
their parents’ expectations is pretty normal.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4004_1001_16:
Since we came here, my mother’s been
changing, slowly but surely.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4004_1001_17:
I think the incident in Alola gave her a
reason to change, so she’s been trying to
treat us differently.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4004_1001_19: We’ve got a lot of issues in our family, but...
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4004_1001_20:
In her own way, she’s trying to let go of
the past and move forward.
episode_event_pasiotower_02/4004_1001_23:
Makes me wonder if I’ll ever move
forward with my mum, too.
